• Has built-in wardrobes

Salim (Palm Jumeirah and Dubai Specialist)+971529023340
Best in Dubai Marina, Park Island offers a one-of-a-kind design that redefines aesthetic living by the waterfront.
Featuring landscaped gardens, and ideally positioned to offer views of the Marina from most units, Park Island comprises four towers and offers a swimming pool, gym,squash court, sauna, kids playing area, bbq area etc..
Maximizing space utilization through creative approaches, the apartments have designer suite finishes, stone counter-tops and stylish cabinetry.
A peninsula-shaped development, Park Island offers a one-of-a-kind design that redefines aesthetic living by the waterfront. Featuring landscaped gardens, and ideally positioned to offer views of the Marina from most units, Park Island comprises four towers
They are built amidst cascading and stepped water features, palm trees, and terraced planting beds. With uncompromising high standards, the ultra-modern apartments offer luxurious finishes with access to both beach and Marina walk. With uncompromising high standards, the ultra-modern apartments offer luxurious finishes and advanced technological features.']

descriptions: ["DescriptionMamsha AlSaadiyat is an exclusive beachfront development comprising of luxury apartments, penthouses and townhouses with breathtaking sea views. Located in The Saadiyat Cultural District, Mamsha features a pristine 1.4km white sandy beach and will be home to diverse retail and F&B outlets. \nMamsha is a brand new development which will feature 461 residential properties with a variety of premium quality facilities including gymnasiums, swimming pools, landscape gardens, a beach promenade, children's playgrounds, walking and cycling paths. All properties will benefit from direct beach access and close proximity to world class museums and everything which the island has to offer, including Saadiyat Grove, a premium retail destination just a short walk away."]
